name: GoodHome Air conditioning door & window seal
description: Easy to install and suitable for all air conditioning units, this window seal kit is ideal for upgrading the air conditioners performance. It reduces the return flow of warm air, so that your mobile air conditioning unit can be more efficient and cools your room in less time. Useful for increasing cooling performance and reducing energy consumption.

name: Yale Premium Plus Intruder alarm kit
description: The Yale Premium Alarm Set includes 2x motion detectors, 2x door/window opening sensors, 1x control panel and 1x outdoor siren. The part arm feature means you can choose which zone of your home needs to be controlled by the system, offering security to your home even when you're in. Comes with 2x motion detectors, 2x door/window contacts, control panel, external siren, batteries and fixing pack. The different components are already pre-linked which means it's easier and quicker set up.

name: Yale HSA Wireless Door & window Intruder alarm contact
description: Compatible with All Yale security alarms less than 4 years old. Features and benefits30m wireless range. Zone control panel. Battery-powered.

name: Yale IA-320 Sync Smart 6 piece Intruder alarm kit
description: Integrate your Sync Alarm with other Yale security products, including Cameras and Smart Lock* in one place with the Yale Home AppE.g. Bringing you a new level of security with the ability to integrate with lights and voice assistants to enhance your security system. The Yale Sync Smart Home Alarm is BSI IOT Kitemarked; having undergone rigorous testing including quality, durability and physical attack tests, this alarm is secure against advanced hacking methods. Choose whether to fully secure or part arm your system for total security, making it easy to feel secure at night or when leaving pets at home.

name: Yale Essentials Intruder alarm kit
description: Easy, wire-free set up for quick and easy installation. The Essentials Alarm keeps your home secure without any monitoring fees. Battery powered and wire-free for easy installation. Fully expandable system with up to 3 accessories/zones.

name: Yale Shed & garage alarm kit
description: Fully expandable using touch and link technology. Wall mounted or free standing. Easy and wire-free installation. Motion detector alarm.

description: Scare off burglars with glass break sensor alarmsA loud alarm of 90 dB will be triggered when the sensor detects vibrations or if the windows breaks. The set contains two sensors that will sound an alarm when a burglar tries to enter your home by smashing a window. Secure your home with the Smartwares Glass Break Sensor Alarm. Easy to use with a switch on the side to turn on and off.

name: Smartwares Mini alarm Wireless Intruder alarm sensor, Pack of 2
description: Ideal for doors and windows but also can be used for for smaller objects such as medicine cabinetsA sound pressure level of 90dB will be triggered when the sensor detects vibrations or if the windows breaks. It is also possible to use the alarm to secure a cabinet where you store your medicine or detergents. Intruders will be deterred when they attempt to break into a secured areas and hear the loud 85 dB alarm. Switch the alarm easily on and off by using the switch on the side of the alarm unit.

name: Yale Wireless Intruder alarm motion sensor
description: When the alarm is set, the infrared sensor will pick up movement and activate the siren. Suitable for garages and outbuildings90° detection range. Fittings & fixings included. Compatible with HSA range.

name: Yale IA Wireless Door Contact sensor
description: The Yale Door/Window Contact is easy to link with your Yale Sync Smart Home Alarm allowing you to customise your system with up to 40 accessories, with no need to use screws, perfect if you are renting your home. Link to your Yale Sync Smart Home Alarm straight out of the box, allowing you to customise your system with 40 accessories. description: Our Smart Home alarms are easy to set up and fully controllable from our Yale Home App through your phone, tablet and Apple Watch as well. name: Smartwares Pincode Wireless Intruder alarm sensor, Pack of 1
description: You can mount the alarm to your door or window to get warned if burglars try to force your door or window to get inside. name: Yale AC-KF Alarm key fob
description: The Key Fob is easy to link with your Yale Sync Smart Home Alarm allowing you to customise your system with up to 40 accessories, with no need to use screws, perfect if you are renting your home. name: Bosch Smart Home Wireless Door & window Alarm contact sensor
description: It can work alongside all other Bosch Smart Home products to reduce or stop heating when windows are opened and trigger an alarm in the event of unauthorised entry. Status display (open/closed) shows in App favourites. Notifies connected radiator thermostats about open windows. Detects and informs about open doors and windows.

name: Aico SmartLINK Interlinked Alarm module
description: The module plugs into the designated slot on the back of all Ei3000 series alarm heads. Allows wireless interconnection with up to 12 alarms and devices. Receives, transmits and repeats RF specific data. The Aico alarm module is an optional add-on for use with the Ei3000 series of alarms.

name: Ring 2nd Gen Alarm keypad
description: Compatible with 1st and 2nd generation Ring Alarm devices and accessories.3 available security modes: Home, Away & Disarmed. All new panic buttons will sound the siren on your base station or outdoor siren and notify your emergency contacts. Featuring a more compact design to seamlessly blend into your home, Ring Alarm Keypad can be placed wherever is most convenient to easily arm and disarm your Alarm system. Compatible with 1st and 2nd generation Ring Alarm devices and accessories.

name: Bosch Smart Home White Room control kit
description: Thanks to the intelligent interaction between the devices of the Bosch Smart Home Indoor Climate Starter Kit, you always enjoy your personal feel-good temperature at home, while saving energy at the same time. Comes with 1x Smart Home controller, 1x door/window contact & 2x radiator thermostats. Door/Window contact informs radiator thermostats about open windows. With a smart home, you save valuable time and money in the long term.

name: Bosch Smart Home Smart 4 piece Starter alarm kit
description: Comes with- 1x Smart Home controller, 1x door/window contact, 1x smoke detector & 1x motion detector. The combination of smart products detects smoke or unauthorized access and triggers an alarm siren. Ideal combination of Bosch Smart Home products for a home alarm system. Warning notifications are sent to the Bosch Smart Home App immediately.

name: Bosch Smart Home RFPR-ZB-SH-EU Wireless Motion detector
description: Automatic light control (via the app service "moving light“)Pet immunity for pets weighing up to 25kg. Secures your home with integration into Bosch Smart Home alarm system, sneak-by guard and demolition alarm. When at home, you can use the Motion Detector for automatic lighting control with Philips Hue or Ledvance lamps as well as Bosch Smart Plugs. Minimal maintenance - battery life of up to 5 years.

name: Bosch Smart Home Flood & water alarm
description: The Bosch Smart Home water alarm informs you in the event of a water leakage – visually (blue flashing of your Philips Hue or Ledvance lights), acoustically and via app - and helps you to prevent significant water damage. The flat, compact design makes it fit into corners and under many washing machines. An app automation will immediately deactivate household devices connected to Bosch smart plugs to prevent further water spillage. The water alarm also activates your indoor camera to see live images while the emergency call button pops up in your Smart Home app.

name: Ring Wireless Outdoor Siren
description: To use the Dusk to Dawn feature you will need to power Outdoor Siren with a Quick Release Battery Pack combined with a Solar Panel for a continuous charge, or hardwired for non-stop power. Outdoor Siren also supports Ring Plug-in Adapter (2nd Generation) which allows you to power the Dusk to Dawn feature from an internal electrical socket. Connect an additional compatible power source and turn on the Dusk to Dawn feature to use Ring Alarm Outdoor Siren as an everyday security sign. With Dusk to Dawn activated, your Outdoor Siren will be visible after dark and will let the neighbourhood know you have security covered.

name: Steinel DL Vario Quattro S LED Ceiling Light Motion Sensor 4 Detection Zones Ourdoor Sensor Light Warm White Softlight
description:
The ceiling light provides 1000 lm of illumination at an output of 9,8 W and can be mounted at heights of up to 6 m, including a convenient night light function (10%) at twilight.

Up to 80% energy saving
The savings apply in comparison to using a conventional LED light without motion detector with the same power for an average of 10 hours of continuous light a day. In comparison, the STEINEL LED light with motion detector only lights up for an average of 2 hours at night because the light is only switched on when movement is detected. Patented HDPE cover also serves as sensor lens and allows ideal light diffusion. Sensor-switched ceiling light providing reliable 360° all-round detection.

Comes with 8*150 mm drill bit*1,10*150 mm drill bit*1,12*150 mm drill bit*1,14*250mm Point chisel*1,14*250mm flat chisel*1. Driving them is a powerful 1500W motor delivering a maximum hammer power of 5J which drives 32mm diameter holes through masonry or 40mm holes through wood. The accessory kit contains 3 drill bits (8x150, 10x150 and 12x150mm), and 2 chisels in flat (14x250mm) and point (250mm) heads.

name: 3M Disposable dust mask 8812, Pack of 3

name: JG Speedfit Push-fit 90° Pipe elbow (Dia)15mm, Pack of 10
description: Should the need arise to demount the connection unlock the nut and push the collet towards the body of the fitting and pull the pipe to release. Simply push the fitting fully onto the pipe and twist the plastic nut clockwise to lock in place. The fitting ensures an easier working environment in confined places and removes the need for hot works on site. Push-fit plastic fitting for the connection of plastic and copper pipe.

name: Solder ring 90° Pipe elbow (Dia)15mm, Pack of 10
description: Requires the use of a blowtorch to seal the pre installed solder ring located inside of the fitting. Please note, any copper piping will need to be prepared with a pipe cleaner and flux prior to soldering. Simply heat the fitting with a blow torch to release the pre-fitted solder, to produce a reliable and secure joint. All fittings supplied pre-soldered for a quality finish.

name: Plumbsure Compression 90° Pipe elbow (Dia)15mm
description: Brass plumbing fittings are best suited for hot water distribution as they can withstand high temperature. They have excellent conductivity which promotes the efficiency of hot water distribution within the house. The fittings do not rust, and are perfect for those who live in areas that have water with corrosive properties. Compared to other metal fittings, Brass has one of the highest resistances to corrosion.

name: FireAngel FA3820-T2 Carbon monoxide Alarm with 10-year lifetime battery, Pack of 2
description: Pressing the large test button in the event of a low battery warning will activate our sleep easy feature which silences the low battery chirp for 8 hoursA 10 year battery is sealed within the alarm which will offer protection for the lifetime of the device, without needing to change the batteries. Press the test button once for a complete alarm test with a quieter audible alert or press twice for a complete test with full alert. The CO sensor will detect, and provide a warning to, low levels of carbon monoxide, and will provide a ventilate alert as this increases. Angel design their CO detectors in-house and rigorously test them to ensure the highest standard of protection for your family and home.

name: FireAngel SCB10-R Optical Smoke & carbon monoxide Alarm with 10-year lifetime battery
description: Activate the Sleep Easy function to silence low battery chirps for 8 hours - giving you a peaceful night's sleep. The unit has both smoke and carbon monoxide sensors for detection of both dangers and has clear indicators and alerts to allow you to see which is present when the alarm sounds. Easily test the unit with a sweeping brush from the floor below by pressing the large test button. The unit comes with a sealed, tamper proof battery that will last the lifetime of the alarm.

name: FireAngel FA3820-EUX10 Carbon monoxide Alarm with 10-year lifetime battery
description: Pressing the large test button in the event of a low battery warning will activate our sleep easy feature which silences the low battery chirp for 8 hoursA 10 year battery is sealed within the alarm which will offer protection for the lifetime of the device, without needing to change the batteries. Press the test button once for a complete alarm test with a quieter audible alert or press twice for a complete test with full alert. The CO sensor will detect, and provide a warning to, low levels of carbon monoxide, and will provide a ventilate alert as this increases. name: FireAngel FA3313-EUX10 Carbon monoxide Alarm with Replaceable battery
description: Pressing the large test button in the event of a low battery warning will activate our sleep easy feature which silences the low battery chirp for 8 hours. The red LED will flash following an alarm event which means if you were away from the home at the time of the event you're made aware of the risk. Alarm is supplied with 2x AA batteries which can be replaced upon hearing the low battery warning. The CO sensor will detect, and provide a warning to, low levels of carbon monoxide, and will provide a ventilate alert as this increases.

name: FireAngel FA3313-SB1-T2 Optical Smoke & carbon monoxide Alarm with Replaceable battery
description: Pressing the large test buttons on both alarms in the event of a low battery warning will activate our sleep easy feature which silences the low battery chirp for 8 hours. Replace the smoke alarm after 10 years, and the CO alarm after 7 years, to ensure your home is protected. The optical smoke alarm works by 'seeing' smoke as it enters the alarm - making it perfect for slow burning fires where there is thick white smoke. The carbon monoxide alarm will detect, and provide a warning to, low levels of CO, and will provide a ventilate alert as this increases.

name: FireAngel FA3313-T2 Carbon monoxide Alarm with Replaceable battery, Pack of 2
description: Pressing the large test button in the event of a low battery warning will activate our sleep easy feature which silences the low battery chirp for 8 hours. The red LED will flash following an alarm event which means if you were away from the home at the time of the event you're made aware of the risk. Rigorously tested in-house and third party approved and certified to Kitemark standards.

name: Aico Ei208 Standalone Carbon monoxide Alarm with 10-year sealed battery
description: Built in AudioLINK data extraction technologyLCD displays carbon monoxide level, status messages and icons. The unit can be easily fixed to a wall or ceiling due to the twist on mounting base which has multiple fixing points. Proven electrochemical CO sensor10 years lithium battery powered. Equipped with hush button.

name: FireAngel Pro Connected Battery-powered Interlinked Smart Carbon monoxide alarm
description: Angel Pro Connected safety range has been designed to combine the latest patented technology, which provides a rapid alert to any fire or Carbon Monoxide dangers in your home, with a smart home hub which gives you ultimate control whilst you’re away from the home with instant alerts and updates via the free Fire. Angel Pro Connected Gateway (FP1000W2-R) in to the network to activate instant alerts to you mobile and make testing easy - Just Ask Alexa or follow the simple steps in the free app. Siren with optional app & email notifications when added to FP1000W2-R35 m (over 200 m in clear air) of wireless range. Angel Pro Connected carbon monoxide alarm provides instant alerts to dangerous levels of the silent killer - Carbon Monoxide.

name: FireAngel TCO-9XQ Wireless Carbon monoxide Alarm with 7-year battery, Pack of 2
description: Complies with the 2022 Scottish legislation7 Year Manufacturer's Warranty1 Year Replaceable Batteries Included. name: Google Nest Battery-powered Smoke & carbon monoxide alarm
description: Split Spectrum Sensor that detects both fast- and slow-burning fires. Comes with heat sensor which detects sudden rises in temperature. It has an industrial grade smoke sensor, can be silenced from your phone, tests itself automatically and lasts for up to 10 years.

name: Keter Store it out midi Wood effect Garden storage box
description: Ideal outdoor storage solution for garden tools and equipment, BBQ and accessories and x2 120L wheelie bins. It even has a sturdy built-in floor panel to keep your items clean and dry and a built-in support for a shelf (shelf not included). Heavy-duty floor with built-in support for shelving and 880 L capacity. Elegant wood effect panels that opens from the top or the front and with a lockable feature for secure closure.

name: Keter Store-it-out ARC Plastic Garden storage box
description: With the capacity to hold two 240 L/63 G wheelie bins, there is also a built in shelf support for extra storage options (Shelf not included). In order to make storage easy it opens from the top or from the front, has an easy-opening lid and a sloped threshold that makes rolling large items in or out simple. We recommend that garden storage boxes are sited on pre-laid, level, solid and dry ground, with a foundation of either a wooden base, concrete or paving to give a stable and even footing. The Store-It-Out ARC is a high-capacity storage shed that provides dry and ventilated storage for up to 1200 L of contents thanks to its durable and weather-resistant construction.

name: Keter Store It Out Max Wood effect Garden storage
description: This global best-selling storage bin is a easy to bring home with you, quick to assemble and compact enough to be placed anywhere within your landscape to store items ranging from barbecues to lawn furniture. In order to make storage easy it opens from the top or from the front, has an easy-opening lid and a sloped threshold that makes rolling large items in or out simple. Heavy-duty floor with main door bolt and secondary foot bolt for secure closure. Elegant wood affect panels with a piston-assisted lid and wide opening doors and a 1200 L capacity.

name: Keter Store it out ultra Wood effect Plastic Bike store
description: Assembled external dimensions: 177 x 113 x 134 cm (L x W x H); internal dimensions: 164 x 97 x 127 cm (L x W x H)The dimensions given refer to the external measurements of the product unless otherwise stated. With a storage capacity of 2000 L/530 G this storage shed is perfect as a bike store or alternatively can hold two 360L or three 140L wheelie bins, or items like barbecues, lawn mowers and garden furniture, while shelves can be placed inside for increased storage options. This storage bin is easy to bring home, easy to move around , easy to assemble, lockable and comes with a bin opening kit. This Store-It-Out Ultra shed is the ultimate outdoor storage solution and bike store that will fit anywhere within your garden or patio area.

name: Keter Comfy Wood effect Plastic Garden storage box 270L
description: Assembled external dimensions: 44.5 x 17.4 x 22.2 inches (L x W x H); internal dimensions: 44.6 x 15.6 x 20 inches (L x W x H)Please ensure that this box is installed on a flat and level surface. The dimensions given refer to the external dimensions of the product unless otherwise stated. Combines the practicality of a patio storage box with a decorative two person seat. The Comfy Garden Storage Box can hold up to 270L / 71 gal on the inside and can support up to 220 kg/485 lbs on its lid, which can provide for often needed seating space.

name: Dryrod Damp Proofing Rods (10 Pack) - Next Generation Rising Damp Treatment from The Makers of Dryzone
description:
BBA Approved – The High-Performance DPC Treatment is Certified by the British Board of Agrément to be effective against the ingress of moisture for at least 20 years. No specialist equipment required - simply insert into 12mm holes in the mortar lines of a building to form a powerful waterproof barrier. Extensively Tested and Internationally Approved
Laboratory testing has proven that Dryrod Damp-Proofing Rods out-perform competing treatment methods, even in highly-saturated walls and freezing temperatures. Once inserted, the rods diffuse their water-repellent material along the mortar course, curing to form an effective barrier to rising damp.

name: Steinel DL Vario Quattro S LED Ceiling Light Motion Sensor 4 Detection Zones Ourdoor Sensor Light Warm White Softlight
description:
The ceiling light provides 1000 lm of illumination at an output of 9,8 W and can be mounted at heights of up to 6 m, including a convenient night light function (10%) at twilight.

Up to 80% energy saving
The savings apply in comparison to using a conventional LED light without motion detector with the same power for an average of 10 hours of continuous light a day. In comparison, the STEINEL LED light with motion detector only lights up for an average of 2 hours at night because the light is only switched on when movement is detected. Patented HDPE cover also serves as sensor lens and allows ideal light diffusion. Sensor-switched ceiling light providing reliable 360° all-round detection.

name: ThermoSphere 2.5m2 electric underfloor heating kit including white thermostat
description: Sphere Mesh ensures an extraordinary level of quality, with a self-adhesive mesh that creates a protective layer for the fully earthed Twisted Twin heating cable. The twisted construction of the cables helps minimize stress, ensuring peace of mind for those concerned about their investment. Sustainable Thermo Sphere’s cutting-edge control design enables users to create heating zones only in the rooms they want; this means less money being wasted by heating up empty spaces and minimal maintenance requirements - goodbye to expensive service plans! Through its 100% efficient output, meaning less heating time is required for comfort level, and its easy installation, electric heating is ideal for both new build and retrofit projects - both of which can be accomplished by a competent DI.

These 5mm laminate & solid wood flooring underlay panels ensure stability under pressure - protecting the flooring from damage caused by footfall or heavy furniture. Helps to level sub-floor irregularity/unevenness up to 2mm. Also, they are made from natural wood fibre which makes them an environmentally friendly choice.

name: Diall Aquastop 5mm Extruded polystyrene (XPS) foam Laminate & solid wood flooring Underlay panels
description: Helps to level sub-floor irregularity/unevenness up to 4mm. Simple to install thanks to a “puzzle” easy click, easy lay & easy cut system. These Diall underlay panels are perfect for laying down your laminate or solid wood flooring. Combined with an integrated vapour barrier, they protect the flooring from damage caused by moisture, as well as protection under heavy loads.

name: Diall 2mm Foam Laminate & solid wood flooring Underlay panels, 20m²
description: This Diall foam underlay insulates from the ground and prevents the rising of humidity, improves walking comfort and reduces footfall sound. Helps to level sub-floor irregularity/unevenness up to 1mm. Room use:Any room. Suitable for use with underfloor heating.

name: Duralay 3mm Laminate flooring & glueless wood flooring Underlay roll, 7.5m²
description: This Duralay Silentwalk Underlay has a foiled back for added thermal insulation, and provides a moisture barrier to prevent damp rising from the sub-floor. Reduces sound transmission by 22 db. Can help to reduce the impact of noise pollution. Suitable for use with underfloor heating.

name: Vitrex Classic 5mm Foam Laminate & solid wood flooring Underlay panels, Pack of 19
description: High degree of moisture resistance, anti fungal and mildew resistant - will not rot. These Vitrex 5mm foam underlay panels are lightweight and easy to lay, they will improve floor levelling while reducing sound impact. Excellent impact sound insulation of up to 20dB. Non dusting, non toxic and odourless. Withstands high weight surface loads.

name: Diall 1mm Foam Luxury vinyl click flooring Underlay panels
description: This low thickness underlay has good acoustic insulation properties, especially when it comes to impact noise. The anti-slip surface prevents individual panels from sliding and opening the joints. The pressure resistant foam core provides reliable protection for flooring against damage. This underlay is designed specifically for use with our luxury vinyl click flooring range.

name: Diall 5mm Extruded polystyrene (XPS) foam Laminate & solid wood flooring Underlay panels
description: Simple to install thanks to a “puzzle” easy click, easy lay & easy cut system. Helps to level sub-floor irregularity/unevenness up to 4mm. The best value for money underlay. Reliable protection under heavy loads.

name: Diall 3mm Foam Laminate & solid wood flooring Underlay panels, 15m²
description: It levels out small localized irregularities of the floor, and stops any moisture related problems arising from a damp sub-floor. Helps to level sub-floor irregularity/unevenness up to 2mm. Improves walking comfort & reduces footfall sound. Insulates from the ground & prevent the rising of humidity.

name: Diall 2.2mm Extruded polystyrene (XPS) foam Laminate & solid wood flooring Underlay panels
description: Good for impact sound reduction (20dB), convenient for installation (folded-accordion: easy lay and easy cut system)Suitable for frequently used rooms. In order to make the fitting task easier, it is recommended to apply an aluminium tape to protect the underlay edges between each underlay section as it is laid. Ideal for low installation heights (Flat surface needed)Helps to level sub-floor irregularity/unevenness up to 1mm. Guarantees sustained quality & global excellent performance with only 2.2mm thickness.

name: Diall 0.15mm Foam Laminate & solid wood flooring Vapour barrier membrane, 20m²
description: This 0.15mm vapour barrier membrane is an absolute must before laying a laminate or a parquet, in conjunction with an underlay. Effectively stops any moisture related problems arising from a damp sub-floor. Suitable for use with underfloor heating. Room Use - Any room.

name: Diall 0.25mm Plastic Underlay panels
description: Complies to buildings regulation standard BBA: 94/3009. Acts as a moisture & vapour barrier. Acts as a moisture and vapour barrier. Can be used in conjunction with all B&Q underlays.

name: Diall 6mm Recycled fibres Carpet Underlay panels, 8.35m²
description: These 6mm Diall carpet underlay panels are an essential before laying your flooring - they are also made from recycled fibres making them an environmentally friendly choice. Helps to level sub-floor irregularity/unevenness up to 4mm. Offers heat & sound insulation. Room use:Any room.

name: Duralay Timbermate Excel Wood Flooring Underlay 3.6mm - 15sqm Roll
description:
Independently tested to produce a sound reduction rating of 56 SONE*
3.60 mm gauge high density resilient rubber underlay
Vapourstop barrier that helps prevent moisture
Prevents the overstraining of wood and laminate boards
Provides an excellent sub-floor masking minor surface imperfections
. Noise Reducing Wood & Laminate Underlay

Duralay Timbermate Excel is part of the Timbermate Range of underlays along with Silentfloor Gold.

. Timbermate Excel reduces in-room noise by up to 30% and contains our Vapourstop barrier to help prevent moisture.

. Simple, quick and easy to install.

name: Diall 2mm Cork Laminate & solid wood flooring Underlay panels, 10m²
description: It’s compression strength protects the flooring from damage incurred as the flooring is used & subjected to loads. It is manufactured from renewable raw materials & therefore assists in environmentally-aware renovation. Helps to level sub-floor irregularity/unevenness up to 0.5mm. It can be used under ceramic tiles, floating floors, glue down wood or carpets.

name: 3.5mm Sponge rubber Laminate & solid wood flooring Underlay roll, 10m²
description: A luxury underlay for wood and laminate floors made from recycled vehicle tyres, which improves the feel and extends the life of your floor. Very high recycled content - environmentally sound.

name: Lumberjack Portable Bench Top Thicknesser with Blades
description: The large fully polished table aids smooth feed of timber and the well placed dust extraction port allows a clear view or the ability to connect to an extractor if required. The four post design adds stability and allows smooth operation of the cutter-head, also included is a No-volt release switch that prevents uncontrolled re-start after any power interruption. name: Lumberjack 13mm Bench Top Drill Press 5 Speed Electric Pillar Drills 300W Motor
description: The Lumberjack DP13-580B bench pillar drill is manufactured from high quality cast iron, accurately machined and may be secured to most permanent types of workbench to provide a reliable, accurate and easy to control eye level pillar drill. Large adjustable cast iron tableNVR switch for added safety. Professional ergonomic rubber grips13mm Drilling capacity. Powerful 300W Motor5 Speed ranges13mm Chuck capacity.

name: Lumberjack Professional Planer Thicknesser 1500W 10 x 5 Inch with Legstand Red
description:
The sturdy parallel stop can be adjusted from 0° - 45° to enable edges to be routed with ease as well. Adjustable planing depth up to 2mm8500 rpm cutter block speed for a precise smooth finish. Dust Extraction port diameter: 76mm. Powered by a belt driven 1500W motor the machine and balanced cutter
block house two resharpenable HSS blades.

name: Mac Allister 150W Bench grinder MBGP150B
description: Comes with 2 x grinding discs, 2 x adjustable tool rests & eye shield with mounting bracket. This bench grinder is ideal for sharpening tools, removing rust and other grinding jobs. Adjustable eye shields to protect eye during operation. Adjustable tool rests for enhance precision and control.

name: Lumberjack Wet & Dry Bench Sharpener Grinder Polisher Tool with 250W Induction Motor
description: Features an angle adjustable tool rest to suit workpiece125mm Dry stone with eye shield guard and fixed tool rest. Fitted with a 250W induction motor suitable for workshop use200mm Sharpening wet stone with adjustable flow rate water bath and drain outlet. Wet Speed: 320rpm. Dry Speed: 2850rpm.

name: Autojack Inverter Welder 155Amp MMA MIG DC TIG Gasless
description:
Powered by a 13amp plug, ECO-MIG 155 is ready to use straight from the box (just add gas for MIG & TIG welding and electrodes for MMA).Triple function covering MIG, gasless - FCAW & MMA welding. Duty Cycle - 140 Amp @ 30% 100 Amp @ 60% 77 Amp @ 100%. The welder comes complete with a Euro-MIG welding torch, Electrode holder, Earth clamp, mask, brush and some tips to help get you started.
. The Autojack Fusion ECO-MIG 155 is a 3-in-1 welder that combines MIG/MMA/TIG (DC) all in the one unit, making it an ideal choice for the majority of your welding needs.

name: Autojack Portable Inverter Welder 140Amp MMA DC Lift TIG
description: Easy arc starting ensuring minimal spatter. High-efficiency with a 40 Khz inverter frequency. The Autojack ECN-140 is a new MMA welder exclusive to Autojack Tools. It comes complete with an electrode holder, earth clamp and face mask.

name: Lumberjack Industrial Heavy Duty Planer Thicknesser Includes Wheels and Dust Extraction
description: The cutter block has a speed of 6700 rpm and is fitted with 2 quality blades allowing it to make 13,400 cuts per minute for an extra smooth finish, the table measures 1075mm long and 305mm wide allowing for planing of the 12 inch boards and a maximum 3mm depth of cut can be achieved in one pass. The thicknesser table measures 500mm x 305mm allowing a huge stock capacity of 12 inch x 6 inch with a maximum depth of 2mm per pass. Features and benefitsA heavy duty cast iron tables give this machine a degree of accuracy not found elsewhere on machines of this capacity or price bracket - infeed table is easily and accurately adjusted using the robust lever and clear depth scale. Easy change over from surface planing to thicknessing.

name: Autojack ECO TIG Inverter Welder 160Amp MMA DC AC Dual Purpose
description: This welder is multi-use so you can weld stainless steel, carbon steel, copper and other coloured metals30% Duty Cycle at Max Amps for longer weld time. Powered by a 230v 16amp supply (plug not included) and only weighing 7kg, this welder is lightweight and portable making it ideal for both the hobbyist and professional alike. Easy Change Over (MMA / TIG)For experienced and DIY users alike with it's intuitive design. The Autojack ECOTIG-160 inverter DC welding machine is a dual purpose machine which allows the user to do both gas TIG welding and also MMA welding.

name: Livingandhome 12 Ton Black Shop Hydraulic Press H Frame Floor Standing
description: Working Range: 0 - 810 mm, Oil Tripod Stroke: 125 mm. Dimensions: 59cm W x 50cm D x 132cm HMaterial:. Press Ton: 12 Ton. And if you are working on some long pieces, don’t worry, you can have your job done thanks to its open construction.

name: Lumberjack 305mm 5 Speed Cast Iron Mini Woodworking Wood Lathe Red
description: The finely ground cast iron bed, along with the cast iron headstock, tailstock and tool rest, greatly reduce vibration and provide ample strength for the lathe to cope with heavy duty work. Spindle Thread: 1 Inch x 8 TPI. A separate cast iron extension bed is available to purchase for longer items if required. Anti vibration feet for added support5 Step speed change.

name: Bosch 230V 710W Pillar drill PBD 40
description: Keyless precision chuck automatically retightens the drill bit2-speed gearbox: high power in first gear and high speed in second gear. Simply adjust speed to materials with Bosch Electronic for better results. Easily drill into wood, metal and much more with this Bosch Bench DrillIt’s a great addition to any garage or workshop and won’t take up too much space either. Quick clamp holds even round materials for drilling accuracy.

name: Scheppach TIGER 2000S 120W 200 MM Wet Stone Sharpening System
description: Smooth running 120 watt motor200 x 40 mm blue Alu-oxide particle sharpening stoneK220 grit alu-oxide stone gives perfectly sharpened toolsslow 120 rpm stone rotation speed. It features a 200 mm alu-oxide fine particle grinding stone, smooth running 120 watt motor, micro adjustment on the tool bar for built-in accuracy, and slow running whet stone for improved control and perfect sharpening results. Ideal wet stone sharpening system for a variety of tools including HSS wood chisels, plane irons, knives, scissors etc. Leather honing wheel for removing burs and gives perfectly sharpened edges.

name: Scheppach DP16SL 550W 16 MM Bench Pillar Drill
description: Ideal machine for drilling accurate holes in wood, plastic, metal, and other materials with ease, this workshop quality drill press will meet all your drilling needs. With a powerful 550 W motor, 5 speeds, 16 mm max. chuck capacity, exact cross laser alignment, and comes with a machine vise as standard for convenience. Tilting table left/right  : 45* -  0  -  45*. Large 16 mm capacity drill chuck.

name: Autojack 3 in 1 Inverter Welder 205Amp MMA MIG DC TIG Gasless
description: The welder comes complete with a Euro-MIG welding torch, Electrode holder, Earth clamp, mask, brush and some spare tips to help get you started. High duty cycle ensures high welding performance over long durations. The Autojack Fusion ECOMIG 205 is a 3-in-1 welder that combines MIG/MMA/TIG (DC) all in the one unit, making it an ideal choice for the majority of your welding needs. Triple function covering MIG, gasless - FCAW & MMA welding.

name: Charnwood 12'' Floor Standing Thicknesser
description: Supplied with floor stand, carrying handles, rubber feet, blade setting tool, 50mm diameter extraction outlet, 2.5m power cable and UK 3 pin plug. The extractor removes all the dust and chips which will otherwise build up, causing a blockage and eventually damage to the machine. Rubber Coated Drive Rollers50mm Diameter Extraction Outlet. A nice feature, is the addition of 2 chromed rollers on top of the machine which allow the operator to pass longer lengths of timber back to the start position.

name: Lumberjack 16mm Bench Top Drill Press 12 Speed Electric Pillar Drills 600W Motor
description: Powerful quiet 600W induction motor.16mm maximum drilling depth (mild steel).Cast motor housing for improved heat dissipation. This heavy-duty device has a fan-cooled induction motor of 600W. It is made from cast iron body and requires a supply voltage of 230V. It is designed for reliability and maximum performance. Sturdy cast iron tilting table with slots.12 working speeds (180rpm-2240rpm). Chuck capacity ranging between 3mm to 16mm.

name: 8 PACK Wood Turning Chisel Set Long 2 Handed Handles Wood Lathes Shaping Tools
description: L x W x H (mm)  39 x 3 x 26WEIGHT:. 8 PACK Wood Turning Chisel Set -Long 2 Handed Handles- Wood Lathes Shaping ToolsLong, two-handed softwood handles. Suitable for use on wood lathes and for shaping wood. Tool steel shafts and tips.

name: Scheppach PLM1800 1500W 330MM Thickness Planer 230 V
description: Cutterblock cutting speed : 8500 rpm Number of cutter knives : 2. It also feature a large 330 mm wide planing capacity to handle those extra wide boards.

name: Scheppach PLC40 40A Air Plasma Cutter 230V
description: Including 3 nozzles, 3 electrodes (1 pre-assembled each) and compressed air hose with quick connection system. Infinitely adjustable cutting current (15 to 40 A)High quality 2.5 m cutting cable with exchangeable torch attachments2. The PLC40 from Scheppach is a powerful and compact air plasma cutter with a uniform plasma jet and a cutting capacity of max. 12 mm. Suitable for straight and circular cutting of copper, stainless steel, aluminum, iron and steel.

name: Lumberjack 6" Bench Top Grinder Sander with LED Light
description: The heavy-gauge steel base helps to reduce vibration and improves stability during use, offering a workshop or garage ready bench grinder. name: Charnwood W815 Variable Speed Wood Lathe 8" x 13"
description: Supplied with four prong drive centre, revolving tail centre, 150mm (6″) tool rest cross bar with 12mm diameter stem, 75mm (3″) diameter faceplate, 1.9m power cable and UK 3 pin plug. Kneepad insert pockets compliant to EN 14404 when used with site kneepad inserts. Made with recycled polyester, these regular fit work trousers are constructed with double stitching for durability.

name: Site Bolden Grey & black Men's Holster pocket trousers, W34" L32"
description: With 2x reinforced holster pockets, 2x front hip pockets, 2x reinforced free swing thigh pockets, 1x phone pocket, 2x back pockets. Made with recycled polyester, these slim fit stretch work trousers are constructed with triple stitching, free swing pockets to give you ultimate durability and comfort. Metal rivited button fly with YKK metal zip. Featuring Cordura top loading kneepad pockets for longlisting performance.

name: DeWalt Hammond Black Hoodie Large
description: Walt zip thru hooded sweatshirt with front kangaroo pocket. Made from 65% polyester & 35% cotton. With 1 x front kangaroo pocket. Polycotton brush back fleece.

name: DeWalt Hammond Black Hoodie Medium
description: Walt zip thru hooded sweatshirt with front kangaroo pocket. Made from 65% polyester & 35% cotton. With 1 x front kangaroo pocket. Polycotton brush back fleece.

name: Navy Bib & Brace
description: Entry pockets make accessing your main trouser pockets simple. The elasticated waist band and straps ensure comfort and a great fit even when bending and stretching.

name: Site Polypropylene Elasticated belt
description: The metal buckle has an embossed Site logo design. It is elasticated to shape to the body and features a nickel silver-effect snap-shut buckle. This heavy duty, quick-release belt comes in cut-to-size stretch webbing. Suitable for use with all work trousers.

name: White Disposable coverall X Large
description: With an elasticated hood for head-to-foot cover. Made from 100% polypropylene. With No pockets.

name: Site Harrier Black Trousers
description: Pockets breakdown: 2x front insert, 2x front patched, 2x knee, 1x cargo, 1x ruler. Slim-fit multi-pocket trousers with top-loading kneepad pockets, a cargo pocket and a ruler pocket. The top-loading kneepad pockets feature bartacks to keep your pads in place2 back pockets with flaps provide reliable extra storage. With large belt loops to accommodate different belt types.

name: DeWalt Rosewell Black Sweatshirt Large
description: Crew neck printed sweatshirt suitable for chest sizes 42-44". Ribbed crew neck for comfort. Ribbed hem & cuff. Side seam flag label.

name: Site Harrier Camouflage Men's Multi-pocket trousers, W36" L32"
description: Pocket type includes: 4 x Front Hip Pockets, 1 x Cargo Pocket, 2 x Kneepad pockets, 2 x Back pockets (2 x flapped back pockets), 1 x Ruler Pocket (2 x open entry pockets), for easy access to valuables, helping to keep them safe. Featuring reinforced top-loading knee pad pockets and multiple pockets for easy access to tools and valuables. Hardwearing triple stitched seams for strength and durability. Regular fit multi pocket camouflage trousers, with triple stitched seams.

name: DeWalt Brooklyn Black Men's Knitted jacket, Medium
description: Zip thru stretch fleece suitable for chest sizes 39-41", with secure zipped pockets & flatlocked seams. Grid fleece backed stretch base fabric. Zipped chest pocket for secure storage. With 2x zipped front and 1x zipped chest pockets.
